title: Pair of Baby's Pants
description: raised piece design of circles, applique black and yellow florets; red, green, gold and black cordoroy; colored velvet in boots ; blue boot with embroidery in red and green with silver braid; stitched sole
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
